title: cookies dbm complaints (ignored exception) upon exit of `nose`

labels.name: severity-minor
labels.description: a problem which doesn't affect the package's usefulness, and is presumably trivial to fix

body:
eg
```shell
$> python -m nose -s -v -x datalad/support/tests/test_cookies.py 
datalad.support.tests.test_cookies.test_no_blows ... Exception ignored in: <function _Database.close at 0x7fcdcf8b83a0>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yoh/anaconda-5.2.0-2.7/envs/datalad-py3.8/lib/python3.8/dbm/dumb.py", line 274, in close
    self._commit()
  File "/home/yoh/anaconda-5.2.0-2.7/envs/datalad-py3.8/lib/python3.8/dbm/dumb.py", line 129, in _commit
    with self._io.open(self._dirfile, 'w', encoding="Latin-1") as f:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_no_blowsquzk717v/mycookies.dir'
ok
Versions: appdirs=1.4.3 boto=2.49.0 cmd:7z=16.02 cmd:annex=8.20200309-g07fcace cmd:bundled-git=2.26.2 cmd:git=2.26.2 cmd:system-git=2.26.2 cmd:system-ssh=8.0p1 git=3.1.2 gitdb=4.0.5 humanize=2.4.0 iso8601=0.1.12 keyring=21.2.1 keyrings.alt=3.1 msgpack=1.0.0 requests=2.23.0 scrapy=2.1.0 wrapt=1.12.1
Obscure filename: str=b' "\';a&b&c\xce\x94\xd0\x99\xd7\xa7\xd9\x85\xe0\xb9\x97\xe3\x81\x82 `| ' repr=' "\';a&b&cΔЙקم๗あ `| '
Encodings: default='utf-8' filesystem='utf-8' locale.prefered='UTF-8'
Environment: PATH='/home/yoh/anaconda-5.2.0-2.7/envs/datalad-py3.8/bin:/home/yoh/gocode/bin:/home/yoh/gocode/bin:/home/yoh/bin:/home/yoh/.local/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/local/games:/usr/games:/sbin:/usr/sbin:/usr/local/sbin' LANG='en_US.UTF-8' GIT_PAGER='less --no-init --quit-if-one-screen' GIT_PYTHON_GIT_EXECUTABLE='/home/yoh/anaconda-5.2.0-2.7/envs/datalad-py3.8/bin/git'

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 1 test in 0.586s

OK
```
or abit differently (with our warning in addition):

```shell
$> python -m nose -s -v -x datalad/downloaders/tests/test_http.py
datalad.downloaders.tests.test_http.test_docstring ... ok
...
GIT_PYTHON_GIT_EXECUTABLE='/home/yoh/anaconda-5.2.0-2.7/envs/datalad-py3.8/bin/git'
[WARNING] Failed to save possibly updated 2 cookies (portal.nersc.gov, db.humanconnectome.org): [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_t9nrj9v0/.config/datalad/cookies.dat' [dumb.py:_setval:172] 
Exception ignored in: <function _Database.close at 0x7f74fc9be040>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yoh/anaconda-5.2.0-2.7/envs/datalad-py3.8/lib/python3.8/dbm/dumb.py", line 274, in close
    self._commit()
  File "/home/yoh/anaconda-5.2.0-2.7/envs/datalad-py3.8/lib/python3.8/dbm/dumb.py", line 129, in _commit
    with self._io.open(self._dirfile, 'w', encoding="Latin-1") as f:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_t9nrj9v0/.config/datalad/cookies.dir'

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 17 tests in 13.804s

OK
```

In both cases it nohow effects the exit status (good) (was done by #3611).  Even if we pacify our own warning -- I have no clue how to make the unhandled exception trace to go away... I have tried but failed in many ways ;-)
